thread.title: Stop-gap Sellas Tetteh names 21-man squad for Sierra Leone 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifier against Chad
thread.title_full: Stop-gap Sellas Tetteh names 21-man squad for Sierra Leone 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifier against Chad

title: Stop-gap Sellas Tetteh names 21-man squad for Sierra Leone 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifier against Chad
text:
Sports News | 7 October 2015 21:55 CET Stop-gap Sellas Tetteh names 21-man squad for Sierra Leone 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifier against Chad - www.ghanasoccernet.com Sierra Leone 
Sierra Leone coach, Sellas Tetteh has named a 21-man squad for the FIFA World Cup Russia 2018 First Round qualifier against Chad. 
The Leone Stars will play away in N'djamena on October 10 while the return leg will be in the Nigerian city of Port Harcourt, three days later. The West Africans are experiencing a home ban due to the outbreak in the Ebola virus, which has claimed thousands of lives. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us They laugh at me because I am different but I laugh at them because they are all the same By: FRANCIS TAWIAH(Duisb
